title: How would you introduce or describe yourself creatively? - Quora

response.answer_text: Below is an online posting by Meg Dowell: 20 Creative Ways to Introduce Yourself Here are a few examples she shares: “Start with a pop culture reference … relate your name back to a character or figure everyone knows.” e.g. Hi, my name is Elon … just like the person who brought us the Tesla.“Consider the situation … draw from the reason you’re both in a specific place at the same time.”e.g. Hi, I am a cousin of Jill, how do you know her?Another resource is this list generated by Jennifer Kustanovich: 20 Fun Facts To Use When Introducing Yourself Here are some take-offs from examples from Jennifer Hi, my name is Fran, I love art and one of my favorite artists is Picasso … Do you have a favorite artist?Hi, my name is Gwen, I am sorry but I am a bit tired … I had a dream about sky diving last night and it woke me up … Do you ever have dreams that wake you up?Hope these examples & resources give you a few ideas.

Twelve creative ways to enter a room In front of a group of people. Throw open the door and shout, “Tah-Dah!”Sing, “Here I Come To Save The Day!” while slowly descending the stairs.Fall down the stairs.Skip around the room throwing confetti in the air.Dress as a minstrel.Slide down the banister.Cup your right hand to your mouth and shout worriedly “Dorthy Dorthy” in an old woman's voice.Loudly state in an official tone, “I hereby degree that I am here”Pass out twenty dollar bills to all the men and lollypops to all the women.Repeatedly yell “Trump 2020!” while pumping your fist in the air.Wear a Covid-19 face mask with a hole drilled in the middle of it for your cigar.Walk in the room and immediately yell that there is a car with its lights on in the parking-lot but you don’t know the make or color. Tell everyone it was only a joke when they return from the parking lot.
